description: A collection of items stored at contiguous memory locations.
A small, fast storage layer that holds frequently accessed data.
A network of servers to store, manage, and process data remotely.
A method of securing information through encryption.
The process of finding and fixing errors in code.
An attribute or data member in a record or database.
A data structure for organizing web or graphical elements.
A data structure that improves the speed of data retrieval.
Data provided to a program for processing.
A set of principles used to perform computations or solve problems.
A rule that expands into a set of instructions for automation.
The process of analyzing and interpreting input data.
The smallest unit of a digital image or display.
A request for data or information from a database.
A data structure that operates in a last-in, first-out manner.
A single unit of meaningful data in code or language processing.
The process of tracking code execution or events.
Malicious software designed to harm or disrupt systems.
